name: The Runner - 2D Platformer
description:
This is my first 2D platformer game called “The Runner”.

The main modifications I have done to this game are the following:

1- Created a 3-level-game, Each level is designed to have a unique environment, different challenges and gradual difficulty levels. 

2- Used the moving tiles in different speed and directions to make the game more interesting and challenging.

3- Created a new “Score-pickup Enemy” with a unique yellow coloring, in which you get the blue score Dimond if and only if you hit this enemy. 

Credit: Aqeelah Almarhoon - 2021

Hope you enjoy the game

Thank you!
